about: Dataset Schema Compatible with DCAT 2.1.1 for GDI - User Portal Catalogue

help_text.en: [dct:title] This property contains a name given to the Dataset.
[dct:description] This property contains a free-text account of the Dataset.
[dcat:keyword] This property contains a keyword or tag describing the Dataset.
[dct:license] This property refers to the license under which the Dataset is made available.

[dcat:landingPage] This property refers to a web page that provides access to the Dataset, its Distributions and/or additional information. It is intended to point to a landing page at the original data provider, not to a page on a site of a third party, such as an aggregator.
[owl:versionInfo] This property contains a version number or other version designation of the Dataset.
[CKAN] Fallback value for [vcard:fn]
[CKAN] Fallback value for [vcard:hasEmail]
[CKAN] Fallback value for [vcard:fn]
[CKAN] Fallback value for [vcard:hasEmail]
[dcat:contactPoint] This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset.
[vcard:fn] This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset.
[vcard:hasEmail] This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset.
[dct:publisher] This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Dataset available.
[foaf:name] This property contains a name of the agent.
[foaf:mbox] This property contains an email of the agent.
[foaf:homepage] This property refers to a web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue.
[dct:type] This property refers to the type of the Dataset.
[dct:spatial] This property refers to a geographic region that is covered by the Dataset.
[dct:temporal] This property refers to a temporal period that the Dataset covers.
[dct:temporal] This property refers to a temporal period that the Dataset covers.
[dcat:theme] This property refers to a category of the Dataset. A Dataset may be associated with multiple themes.
[adms:versionNotes] This property contains a description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset.

[dcat:landingPage] This property refers to a web page that provides access to the Dataset, its Distributions and/or additional information. It is intended to point to a landing page at the original data provider, not to a page on a site of a third party, such as an aggregator.
[dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters] This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters.
[dcat:temporalResolution] This property refers to the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset.
[dcat:qualifiedRelation] This property provides a link to a description of a relationship with another resource.
[dct:accessRights] This property refers to information that indicates whether the Dataset is open data, has access restrictions or is not public.
[dct:accrualPeriodicity] This property refers to the frequency at which the Dataset is updated.
[dct:conformsTo] This property refers to an implementing rule or other specification.
[dct:creator] The entity responsible for producing the resource.
[dct:identifier] Unique identification of the person/organisation.
[foaf:name] This property contains the name of the creator.
[dct:isReferencedBy] This property is about a related resource, such as a publication, that references, cites, or otherwise points to the dataset.
[dct:isVersionOf] This property refers to a related Dataset of which the described Dataset is a version, edition, or adaptation.
[dct:identifier] This property contains the main identifier for the Dataset, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalogue.
[dct:issued] This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Dataset.
[dct:language] This property refers to a language of the Dataset. This property can be repeated if there are multiple languages in the Dataset.
[dct:modified] This property contains the most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.
[dct:provenance] This property contains a statement about the lineage of a Dataset.
[dct:relation] This property refers to a related resource.
[adms:sample] This property refers to a sample distribution of the dataset.
[dct:source] This property refers to a related Dataset from which the described Dataset is derived.
[dct:type] This property refers to the type of the Dataset.
[dct:hasVersion] This property refers to a related Dataset that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described Dataset.
[foaf:page] This property refers to a page or document about this Dataset.
[prov:qualifiedAttribution ] This property refers to a link to an Agent having some form of responsibility for the resource.
[prov:wasGeneratedBy] This property refers to an activity that generated, or provides the business context for, the creation of the dataset.
[adms:identifier] This property refers to a secondary identifier of the Dataset, such as MAST/ADS , DataCite , DOI , EZID  or W3ID .
[dct:title] This property contains a name given to the Distribution.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data

help_text.en: [dct:description] This property contains a free-text account of the Distribution.
[dct:format] This property refers to the file format of the Distribution.
[dcat:accessURL] This property contains a URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset.
[dcatap:availability] This property indicates how long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.
[adms:status] The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle.
[dcat:accessService] This property refers to a data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.
[dcat:compressFormat] This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file.
[dcat:downloadURL] This property contains a URL that is a direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.
[dcat:mediaType] This property refers to the media type of the Distribution as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
[dcat:packageFormat] This property refers to the format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together.
[dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters] This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters.
[dcat:temporalResolution] This property refers to the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset.
[dct:conformsTo] This property refers to an implementing rule or other specification.
[dct:issued] This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Dataset.
[dct:language] This property refers to a language of the Dataset. This property can be repeated if there are multiple languages in the Dataset.
[dct:modified] This property contains the most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.
[dct:rights] This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Distribution.
[foaf:page] This property refers to a page or document about this Distribution.
[odrl:hasPolicy] This property refers to the policy expressing the rights associated with the distribution if using the ODRL vocabulary.
[spdx:checksumValue] This property provides a lower case hexadecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm.
[spdx:algorithm] This property identifies the algorithm used to produce the subject Checksum.
